Class ingen.html.applet.Param 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----ingen.html.HtmlTag
           |
           +----ingen.html.applet.Param
public class Param
extends HtmlTag

Param(String, String)
SUMMARY:
Creates Object equivalent of Param Html Tag, which specifies parameter values for Java applets.

Param 
 public Param(String name,
              String value)
SUMMARY:
Creates Object equivalent of Param Html Tag, which specifies parameter values for Java applets. The values can reference HTML variables.

PARAMETERS
1) String name    : the value for the NAME attribute.
2) String value   : the value for the VALUE attribute.

GENERATES
<PARAM NAME="name" VALUE="value">
